name: Glorious Demo
description: I created a library to produce web animations. Glorious Demo simulates the use of a Code Editor and a Terminal to demonstrate some code in action.

name: Triven
description: I created a multi-language static blog generator based in Markdown. Triven powers my personal blog and allows me to post articles also in Portuguese.

name: Typenik
description: I created an English Augmented Dictionary called Typenik - available for Web, Windows & Mac - to solve peculiar needs of non-native English speakers.
